content:
"在唱的是Vocaloid的歌，在背景里跳舞的却是你们最可爱的偶像妮可"
"I am singing songs from Vocaloid; but it's your Nico-nii dancing on the LED screen."

由Xiaoleng Official Website开发的LiveDiva™技术，将在11月23日的Xiaoleng Birthday Live上首次运用
LiveDiva™ developed by Xiaoleng Official Website, will be first-time applied on Xiaoleng Birthday Live this November 23rd.
